name: Christmas Candy World - Christmas Games
description:
Candy World - Match 3 Christmas Games from the makers of Birds Pop mania & Pastry Jam, Halloween Witch Connect, Garden Paradise games.

In this festive season, nothing rings in better than sweet Christmas games! If you are looking for a sugary adventure that takes you into a candy mania, Match 3 Sweeper Christmas Candy World is here! A flagship of Launchship Studios, it offers you one of the best Match 3 gameplays with immersive levels. Are you ready to be a part of this journey?

In this fun Santa Xmas game, you will have to help him collect star candies, cakes, lollies, and many other sweetmeats. This cookie mania has hundreds of enticing levels and you will have a fun-filled Match 3 game all through. Use powerful boosters and beat your friends’ scores at every level!

Look out for novel challenges in this Candy World and be Christmas ready at all times. If you love puzzle games and are looking to play a game with your entire family, we have the best one for you. Enjoy the sweet quest like never before with beautiful graphics and cute Santa games. You will love the whole candy mania quest.

GAME FEATURES:
✔ 500+ well-planned levels of adventurous jelly world
✔ Regular updates with fun seasonal themes.
✔ Stunning and vibrant winter season illustrations
✔ FREE to play and in-app purchases to get extra boosters and moves.
✔ Unlock new levels to challenge your friends and family on the leaderboard.
✔ Connect with your Facebook account and share the adventure journey with friends
✔ Show off your gaming progress on the leaderboard
✔ Completely FREE match-3 sweet fever Xmas game
✔ Santa Claus's Free Match 3 Adventure Game.
✔ Play OFFLINE in anytime and anywhere.

Play for free and let the sugary adventure make your Christmas games merrier and more cheerful. Enjoy the latest theme and other festive features. Are you having fun?

Try the Xmas game now and join hundreds of others who are having the best time of the year with our game. This is one of the most enjoyable Match 3 games for people of all ages. So, what are you waiting for?
